constitutionalsection.para: All votes shall be by ballot or by other means authorized by the Legislature whereby the vote and the secrecy of the elector's vote will be preserved.

source.para: Transferred by Constitutional Convention, 1919-1920, art. VI, sec. 6;

annotation.para: Secrecy as to how any elector votes is basic to electoral process. Dugan v. Vlach, 195 Neb. 81, 237 N.W.2d 104 (1975).
